sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.MultiPolyIn</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>MultiPolyIn</name>
        <script><![CDATA[//https://github.com/mfogel/polygon-clipping/blob/v0.15.3/src/geom-in.js
var MultiPolyIn = Class.create();
MultiPolyIn.prototype = {
  initialize: function (geom, isSubject) {
    if (!Array.isArray(geom)) {
      throw new Error('Input geometry is not a valid Polygon or MultiPolygon');
    }

    try {
      // if the input looks like a polygon, convert it to a multipolygon
      if (typeof geom[0][0][0] === 'number') geom = [geom];
    } catch (ex) {
      // The input is either malformed or has empty arrays.
      // In either case, it will be handled later on.
    }

    this.polys = [];
    this.bbox = {
      ll: {
        x: Number.POSITIVE_INFINITY,
        y: Number.POSITIVE_INFINITY
      },
      ur: {
        x: Number.NEGATIVE_INFINITY,
        y: Number.NEGATIVE_INFINITY
      },
    };
    for (var i = 0, iMax = geom.length; i < iMax; i++) {
      var poly = new PolyIn(geom[i], this);
      if (poly.bbox.ll.x < this.bbox.ll.x) this.bbox.ll.x = poly.bbox.ll.x;
      if (poly.bbox.ll.y < this.bbox.ll.y) this.bbox.ll.y = poly.bbox.ll.y;
      if (poly.bbox.ur.x > this.bbox.ur.x) this.bbox.ur.x = poly.bbox.ur.x;
      if (poly.bbox.ur.y > this.bbox.ur.y) this.bbox.ur.y = poly.bbox.ur.y;
      this.polys.push(poly);
    }
    this.isSubject = isSubject;
  },

  getSweepEvents: function () {
    var sweepEvents = [];
    for (var i = 0, iMax = this.polys.length; i < iMax; i++) {
      var polySweepEvents = this.polys[i].getSweepEvents();
      for (var j = 0, jMax = polySweepEvents.length; j < jMax; j++) {
        sweepEvents.push(polySweepEvents[j]);
      }
    }
    return sweepEvents;
  },
  type: 'MultiPolyIn',

};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-01-30 12:49:00</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2566f74c8830a110fa9bf275d1a04332</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>MultiPolyIn</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">fa60558563b044509d2cba84af9c019c</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">fa60558563b044509d2cba84af9c019c</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2566f74c8830a110fa9bf275d1a04332</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-01-30 12:51:21</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
